data.name: Livelock: Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original Soundtrack (Game OST) from the video game Livelock.
Music composed by Vibe Avenue.

Livelock is a co-operative top-down shooter where you play solo or with up to two allies to break the cycle of infinite war between machines. As one of the remaining Capital Intellects, your role is to unlock Eden and revive humanity.

Track Listing

1 Livelock (Main Title)

2 Making It Home Again
3 Open Protocol
4 Awaken Intellect
5 Mini-Boss
6 New York City
7 Brooklyn Bridge
8 Under the Dead City
9 Hell District
10 Protect the Outpost
11 Democritus
12 Lost Humanity
13 Broken City
14 Blackbox
15 Assassinate Seek Out
16 Assassinate Destroy
17 Alpha's Wisdom
18 Assassinate Annihilate
19 Noesis Hatcheries
20 Froezen Wasteland
21 Ambush
22 Ice Cavern
23 Let's Kill Vostok
24 Alpha's Test
25 New Moscow
26 Rooftop Brawl
27 Birth of a New World
28 Victory
29 Credits
30 Livelock (Main Title Alt Version) Bonus Track

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista 64bit, Window 7 64bit, Windows 8 64bit, Windows 10 64bit (32bit OS not supported)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista 64bit, Window 7 64bit, Windows 8 64bit, Windows 10 64bit (32bit OS not supported)
